languages.text: If the target of Provocation is hit by at least one {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} caused by Provocation, the target gains +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat. Fatigued: the target suffers a −10 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and Agility for each stack of fatigued. {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} are reduced by −1 for each stack.
languages.original_text: Если в результате применения способности Провокация ее цели достигает хотя бы одна {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атака по возможности{/g}, то эта цель получает +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомления{/g} до конца боя. Утомление: каждый уровень утомления дает цели штраф −10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} и Ловкости и уменьшает запас {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очков передвижения{/g} на 1.

traits.locale_text: If the target of Disposal is hit by at least one attack of opportunity caused by Disposal, the target gains 1 stack of fatigued until the end of combat.{br} Fatigued: The target suffers a -10 penalty to Strength, Toughness, and Agility tests for each stack of fatigued. Movement points are reduced by -1 for each stack.

If the target of Disposal is hit by at least one attack of opportunity caused by Disposal, the target gains +1 stack of fatigued until the end of combat.{br} Fatigued: The target suffers a −10 penalty to Strength, Toughness, and Agility tests for each stack of fatigued. Movement points are reduced by −1 for each stack.

If the target of Disposal is hit by at least one attack of opportunity caused by Disposal, the target gains +1 stack of fatigued until the end of combat.{br} Fatigued: The target suffers a −10 penalty to Strength, Toughness, and Agility tests for each stack of fatigued. Movement points are reduced by −1 for each stack.

languages.text: Если в результате применения способности Провокация ее цели достигает хотя бы одна {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атака по возможности{/g}, то эта цель получает +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомления{/g} до конца боя. Утомление: каждый уровень утомления дает цели штраф −10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} и Ловкости и уменьшает запас {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очков передвижения{/g} на 1.
languages.original_text: If the target of Provocation is hit by at least one {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} caused by Provocation, the target gains +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat. Fatigued: the target suffers a −10 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and Agility for each stack of fatigued. {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} are reduced by −1 for each stack.

traits.locale_text: Если в результате применения способности Подтолкнуть к безрассудству ее цели достигает хотя бы одна атака по возможности, то эта цель получает +1 уровень утомления до конца боя.{br} Утомление: каждый уровень утомления дает цели штраф −10 к проверкам Силы, Выносливости и Ловкости и уменьшает запас очков передвижения на 1.

Если в результате применения способности Подтолкнуть к безрассудству ее цели достигает хотя бы одна атака по возможности, то эта цель получает +1 уровень утомления до конца боя.{br} Утомление: каждый уровень утомления дает цели штраф −10 к проверкам Силы, Выносливости и Ловкости и уменьшает запас очков передвижения на 1.

languages.text: 如果激怒对手的目标被激怒对手效果造成的{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}，则该目标获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}效果，效果持续至战斗结束。 疲劳：每层“疲劳”效果都会使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}降低10点，{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}降低1点。
languages.original_text: If the target of Provocation is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by at least one {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} caused by Provocation, the target gains +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat. Fatigued: the target suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} for each stack of fatigued. {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} are reduced by −1 for each stack.

traits.locale_text: 如果解决敌人的目标被解决敌人效果造成的{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}命中，则该目标获得1层“疲劳”效果，效果持续至战斗结束。{br} 疲劳：每层“疲劳”效果都会使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}检定遭受-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。每层“疲劳”效果都会使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}降低1点。

languages.text: Si el objetivo de Provocación es {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactado{/g} por al menos un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g} causado por Provocación, dicho objetivo gana +1 acumulación del efecto {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g} hasta el final del combate. Fatigado: El objetivo sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} por cada acumulación de fatigado. Sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} se reducen en −1 por cada acumulación.
languages.original_text: If the target of Provocation is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by at least one {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} caused by Provocation, the target gains +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat. Fatigued: the target suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} for each stack of fatigued. {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} are reduced by −1 for each stack.

traits.locale_text: Si el objetivo de Eliminación es impactado por al menos un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataque de oportunidad{/g} causado por Eliminación, dicho objetivo gana +1 acumulación del efecto fatigado hasta el final del combate.{br} Fatigado: El objetivo sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 a las pruebas de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} por cada acumulación de fatigado. Sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} se reducen en −1 por cada acumulación.

languages.text: Wenn das Ziel von Provokation von mindestens einem {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Überraschungsangriff{/g} getroffen wird, der durch Provokation verursacht wurde, erhält das Ziel bis zum Ende des Kampfes +1 Stapel von {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g}. Erschöpft: Das Ziel erleidet für jeden Stapel von „Erschöpft“ einen Abzug von −10 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} und Beweglichkeit. Die {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} werden für jeden Stapel um −1 reduziert.
languages.original_text: If the target of Provocation is hit by at least one {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} caused by Provocation, the target gains +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat. Fatigued: the target suffers a −10 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and Agility for each stack of fatigued. {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} are reduced by −1 for each stack.

traits.locale_text: Wenn das Ziel von Eliminierung von mindestens einem {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Überraschungsangriff{/g} getroffen wird, der durch Eliminierung verursacht wurde, erlangt das Ziel bis zum Ende des Kampfes +1 Stapel von Erschöpft.{br} Erschöpft: Das Ziel erleidet einen −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke-{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit-{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit-{/g} Proben für jeden Stapel von Erschöpft. {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} werden für jeden Stapel um −1 reduziert.

languages.text: Si la cible de Provocation est {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchée{/g} par au moins une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g} provoquée par Provocation, cette cible bénéficie de +1 cumul de {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Fatigue : pour chaque cumul de Fatigue, la cible subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}. Les {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} sont réduits de −1 par cumul.
languages.original_text: If the target of Provocation is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by at least one {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} caused by Provocation, the target gains +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat. Fatigued: the target suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} for each stack of fatigued. {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} are reduced by −1 for each stack.

traits.locale_text: Si la cible d'Élimination est touchée par au moins une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g} provoquée par Élimination, cette cible bénéficie de +1 cumul de Fatigue jusqu'à la fin du combat.{br} Fatigue : pour chaque cumul de Fatigue, une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -10 s'applique aux tests de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} passés par la cible. Les {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} sont réduits de -1 par cumul.

languages.text: 挑発のターゲットが、挑発によって発動した{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}に1回以上{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した場合、そのターゲットは戦闘終了まで+1スタックの{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}を得る。 疲労：ターゲットは、1スタックごとに{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}タフネス{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}に-10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。1スタックごとに、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が-1減少する。
languages.original_text: If the target of Provocation is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by at least one {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} caused by Provocation, the target gains +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat. Fatigued: the target suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} for each stack of fatigued. {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} are reduced by −1 for each stack.

traits.locale_text: 処理のターゲットが、処理によって発動した{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}に1回以上命中した場合、そのターゲットは戦闘終了まで+1スタックの疲労を得る。{br} 疲労：ターゲットは、1スタックごとに{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}タフネス{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}判定に-10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。1スタックごとに、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}が-1減少する。
